subject: Preferences
body:
Select your Preferences

hi {customerName},

Please choose your preferences by click the link Preferences Thank you or visiting mlife.com. We appreciate the opportunity to assist you. If you did not request to change the password on your mlife. com account or believe that an unauthorized person has accessed your account, please contact M life Member Services at 866.761.7111

Please do not reply to this email. If you received this email in error or would like to request assistance, please click Here to send a message to Mlife Member Services or call 866.761.7111
